title: Enhancing Cybersecurity Infrastructure in Critical Sectors
objective: To invest in and implement state-of-the-art cybersecurity infrastructure that enhances the ability to identify and respond to vulnerabilities in real-time, particularly focusing on the healthcare sector.
timeline_phases: Phase 1: Assessment of Current Cybersecurity Measures
Phase 2: Market Research and Vendor Evaluation
kpis: Reduction in response time to cybersecurity incidents
Number of vulnerabilities identified and mitigated
Percentage of staff trained on new systems
Compliance gaps closed in cybersecurity protocols
User satisfaction scores related to cybersecurity measures
risks: Emerging cybersecurity threats during project duration
